Stomach and sides: Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD),Chronic Cholestasis,Peptic Ulcer Diseae,Gastroenteritis,Typhoid,Hepatitis A,Hepatitis B,Hepatitis C,Hepatitis D,Hepatitis E,Alcoholic Hepatitis
Lower body: Acquired Immunodeficiency Syndrome (AIDS),Diabetes,Jaundice,Malaria,Dengue,Tuberculosis,Dimorphic Hemmorhoids (Piles),Varicose Veins,Hypothyroidism,Hyperthyroidism,Hypoglycemia,Osteoarthristis,Arthritis,Urinary Tract Infection
